string-array.name: symptomSpeech
string-array.item: Mildly affected. No difficulty being understood
Moderately affected. Sometimes asked to repeat statements
Severely affected. Frequently asked to repeat statements

string-array.name: symptomSalivation
string-array.item: Slight but definite excess of saliva in mouth; may have nighttime drooling
Moderately excessive saliva; may have minimal drooling
Marked excess of saliva with some drooling
Marked drooling, requires constant tissue or handkerchief

string-array.name: symptomSwallowing
string-array.item: Requires NG tube or gastrotomy feeding

string-array.name: symptomHandwriting
string-array.item: Moderately slow or small; all words are legible
Severely affected; not all words are legible
The majority of words are not legible

string-array.name: symptomCuttingFood
string-array.item: Somewhat slow and clumsy, but no help needed
Can cut most foods, although clumsy and slow; some help needed
Food must be cut by someone, but can still feed slowly

string-array.name: symptomDressing
string-array.item: Somewhat slow, but no help needed
Occasional assistance with buttoning, getting arms in sleeves
Considerable help required, but can do some things alone

string-array.name: symptomHygiene
string-array.item: Somewhat slow, but no help needed
Needs help to shower or bathe; or very slow in hygienic care
Requires assistance for washing, brushing teeth, combing hair, going to bathroom
Foley catheter or other mechanical aid

string-array.name: symptomTurningInBed
string-array.item: Turning in Bed and Adjusting Bed Clothes
Somewhat slow and clumsy, but no help needed
Can turn alone or adjust sheets, but with great difficulty
Can initiate, but not turn or adjust sheets alone

string-array.name: symptomFalling
string-array.item: Occasionally falls, less than once per day
Falls an average of once daily

string-array.name: symptomFreezing
string-array.item: Rare freezing when walking; may have start hesitation
Frequent freezing. Occasionally falls from freezing

string-array.name: symptomWalking
string-array.item: Mild difficulty. May not swing arms or may tend to drag leg
Moderate difficulty, but requires little or no assistance
Severe disturbance of walking, requiring assistance
Cannot walk at all, even with assistance

string-array.name: symptomTremor
string-array.item: Tremor (Symptomatic complaint of tremor in any part of body)

string-array.name: symptomParkinsonism
string-array.item: Occasionally has numbness, tingling, or mild aching
Frequently has numbness, tingling, or aching; not distressing
